answers.author: Xavier Bishop
answers.text:
I would recommend an intro to each of the city's departments, including a site tour and meeting w/ each of the department heads.  I would also review the current budget, for each department but w/ emphasis on the city's chief sources of revenue and its main expenses.  I would also suggest you review w/ him/her your background and approach to managing. Finally, ask them what issues they see within their ward, the city as a whole and what priorities they have for both. Good luck.

author: Susan Sherman
text: The city of Olathe is appointing a new member to our City Council in the next few months.   Since it is only one person, I am looking for some ideas on interesting and engaging information for an orientation session for this new member of our Council?   Ideas?
title: City Council Orientation
